summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City streets changing the name of a portion of Northeast 41st Street between Union Bay Place Northeast and Surber Drive Northeast to Northeast Mary Gates Memorial Drive and a portion of Union Bay Place Northeast between Northeast 41st street and Northeast 45th Street to Mary Gates Memorial Drive Northeast on the petition of property owners (C.F. 300332) and amending Ordinance 102981, establishing street names within the City of Seattle, to reflect the name change.
